Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed at 79th
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Line trains are standing at 79th due to door problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Line trains are standing at 79th due to door problems.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
